column5: Your room in called the Gemini & there are some great views of Wild-horse Mountain right from your bed. There is an outdoor kitchen with a toaster oven, BBQ smoker and burner and a small refrigerator as well as a shared outdoor toilet & shower. You are about 15 miles from the entrance to the National Park & 10 miles from the Terlingua Ghost Town (possibly the most happening ghost town in the world). 70 miles South of Alpine.
